a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: National poverty line vs. GDP per capita, 2017
The horizontal line indicates the International Poverty Line, set by the World Bank to be representative of national
definitions of poverty adopted by low-income countries.
Data source: Jolliffe et al. (2022); World Bank (2023)
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices to account for inflation and differences in the cost of living between
